info.description: The United States Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Facilities service offers comprehensive details on VA health, benefits, cemeteries, and Vet Centers, including location, contact information, and services available. Data is sourced from both real-time and historical records, ensuring users have access to the latest facility updates. Authentication is managed via symmetric tokens, and the service provides a robust framework for accessing VA facility information efficiently.
info.title: Veterans Affairs Facilities

parameters.description: Comma separated list of facility IDs for the search.
parameters.name: facilityIds

parameters.description: Zip code for searching facilities, considering only the first five digits.
parameters.name: zip

parameters.description: State for facility search, typically a two-character code.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Latitude for facility search in WGS84 coordinates.
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description: Longitude for facility search in WGS84 coordinates.
parameters.name: long

parameters.description: Radial distance from specified point to filter facility search, in miles.
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: Bounding box coordinates for facility search within a geographic area.
parameters.name: bbox[]

parameters.description: VISN (Veterans Integrated Service Networks) code for facility search.
parameters.name: visn

parameters.description: Type of facility location to filter search results.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: A comma separated list of services to filter facilities by the services they offer.
parameters.name: services[]

parameters.description: Flag to include or exclude mobile facilities in the search results.
parameters.name: mobile

parameters.description: Page number of results to return in a paginated response.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of results per page in a paginated response.
parameters.name: per_page

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing API key.

403.description: Request forbidden due to invalid authorization.

406.description: Describes an error encountered during the processing of a request.

429.description: Too many requests sent in a given amount of time.

get.description: Query facilities with a combination of optional search parameters.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the facility, following the format `<prefix>_<station>`, with prefixes like 'vha' (health facility), 'vba' (benefits), 'nca' (cemetery), or 'vc' (vet center).
parameters.name: facilityId

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing API key.

403.description: Forbidden request due to invalid authorization.

413.description: Request payload exceeds the size limit.

429.description: Too many requests made in a short amount of time.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific facility, identified by its unique ID.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the facility, adhering to the format `<prefix>_<station>`, with prefixes indicating the facility type (e.g., 'vha' for health facility, 'vba' for benefits, etc.).
parameters.name: facilityId

parameters.description: A comma separated list of service IDs to filter the search, usable with or without the `serviceType` parameter.
parameters.name: serviceIds

parameters.description: Service type to filter the search, usable with or without the `serviceIds` parameter.
parameters.name: serviceType

400.description: Bad request due to invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing API key.

403.description: Forbidden request due to invalid authorization.

413.description: Request payload exceeds the size limit.

429.description: Too many requests in a short period.

get.description: Queries services offered by a facility, with optional parameters to refine results. Supports independent or combined use of `serviceIds` and `serviceType` for filtering.
get.summary: List services for a specific facility

parameters.description: The facility's unique identifier, structured as `<prefix>_<station>`, where the prefix indicates the type of facility (e.g., 'vha' for health facilities, 'vba' for benefits, etc.).
parameters.name: facilityId

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific service within the facility.
parameters.name: serviceId

200.description: Successful retrieval of detailed information about the specified service at the given facility.

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to absence of API key.

403.description: Forbidden request due to invalid authorization.

404.description: The specified facility or service was not found.

413.description: Request exceeds the allowable payload size.

429.description: Excessive requests made in a short timeframe.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific service offered by a facility, identified by both facility ID and service ID.
get.summary: Get details for a specific service at a facility

parameters.description: Filter for searching by facility type, such as health, cemetery, benefits, or vet center.
parameters.name: type

200.description: Successful response containing a list of all facility IDs, optionally filtered by facility type.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing API key.

403.description: Forbidden request due to invalid authorization.

413.description: Request payload exceeds the size limit.

429.description: Too many requests made in a short period.

get.description: Provides a bulk download option for all facility IDs, with the capability to filter by facility type for more targeted results.
Retrieves all facilities within a specified drive time from a given location, with optional filtering by services.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude from which drive time is calculated.

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Longitude from which drive time is calculated.

parameters.name: drive_time
parameters.description: Maximum drive time in minutes from the location to include facilities.

parameters.name: services[]
parameters.description: An optional comma separated list of service to filter by.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results to return.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

200.description: A successful response providing nearby VA health facilities.

400.description: Bad request due to missing required or ambiguous parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing API key.

403.description: Forbidden request due to invalid authorization.

406.description: Not Acceptable - the requested format is not available.

413.description: Payload Too Large - the request is too large for the server to process.

429.description: Too Many Requests - the client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

address1.title: Address Line 1
address1.description: First line of the address, typically including street name and number.

address2.title: Address Line 2
address2.description: Second line of the address, if applicable, such as a building number or complex name.

address3.title: Address Line 3
address3.description: Third line of the address, if applicable, such as a unit or suite number.

state.title: State
state.description: State code component of the address.

zip.title: ZIP Code
zip.description: Postal (ZIP) code component of the address.

Addresses.description: Holds both mailing and physical addresses for a facility.

ApiError.description: Describes an error encountered during the processing of a request.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: A collection of error messages related to the request.

AppointmentPhoneNumber.title: Appointment Phone Number
AppointmentPhoneNumber.description: Contains phone number information for scheduling an appointment, including extensions and labels.

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: The extension number for the appointment phone.

label.title: Label
label.description: A label describing the appointment phone number (e.g., 'Main phone').

number.title: Number
number.description: The primary phone number for appointments.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of contact number, such as 'tel' or 'fax'.

DetailedService.title: Detailed Service
DetailedService.description: Provides detailed information about a specific service offered by a facility, including appointment information, service availability, and contact details.

appointmentLeadIn.description: Provides additional appointment information, which may include HTML or string formatting characters.
appointmentLeadIn.x-example: Your VA health care team will contact you if you're eligible to get a vaccine during this time.

appointmentPhones.description: A list of phone numbers for scheduling appointments related to this service.

serviceId.title: Service ID

path.title: Service Details Path
path.description: The URL to a page with more details about this service within the facility's health care system.

serviceLocations.title: Service Locations
serviceLocations.description: A list of locations where the service is available.

DetailedServiceAddress.title: Detailed Service Address
DetailedServiceAddress.description: Address information for a specific service location, including street, building, and room details.

addressLine2.title: Address Line 2
addressLine2.description: Additional address information, such as building number.

buildingNameNumber.title: Building Name/Number
buildingNameNumber.description: Name or number of the building for the service location.

city.title: City
city.description: The city of the service location.

countryCode.title: Country Code

state.title: State

wingFloorOrRoomNumber.title: Wing/Floor/Room Number
wingFloorOrRoomNumber.description: The specific wing, floor, or room number of the service location.

zipCode.title: ZIP Code

DetailedServiceHours.title: Detailed Service Hours
DetailedServiceHours.description: Represents the hours of operation for a service, formatted as descriptive text. Hours may vary by holidays or events.

DetailedServiceLocation.title: Service Location Details
DetailedServiceLocation.description: Provides specific details about a location where a service is offered, including hours, contact info, and scheduling options.

additionalHoursInfo.title: Additional Hours Information
additionalHoursInfo.description: Details about service location hours that may vary depending on staff availability.
additionalHoursInfo.x-example: Location hours times may vary depending on staff availability

emailContacts.title: Email Contacts
emailContacts.description: A list of email contacts for facility services.

officeName.title: Office Name

onlineSchedulingAvailable.title: Online Scheduling Availability
onlineSchedulingAvailable.description: Indicates if online scheduling is available for the service.

phones.title: Phone Contacts
phones.description: A list of phone numbers for scheduling appointments or making inquiries.

referralRequired.title: Referral Requirement
referralRequired.description: Indicates if a referral is required to access the service.

DetailedServicesMetadata.description: Holds metadata about the response for detailed services, including pagination details.

data.title: Services List

Distance.title: Distance to Facility

status.title: Error Status
status.description: The HTTP status code associated with this error.

title.title: Error Title

FacilitiesIdsResponse.title: Facility IDs Response

FacilitiesResponse.title: Facilities Response
FacilitiesResponse.description: Describes the response object for one or more VA facilities, including data, pagination links, and metadata.

data.title: Facilities Data
data.description: An array of facility objects providing details about each facility.

Facility.title: Facility
Facility.description: Details a single VA facility's attributes, location, and services.

id.title: Facility ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the facility.

type.title: Facility Type
type.description: Indicates the top-level type of the facility (e.g., VA health facility).

FacilityAttributes.title: Facility Attributes
FacilityAttributes.description: Comprehensive details describing a facility, including its type, services offered, and location details.

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: The subtype of the facility, further describing the facility type.

facilityType.title: Facility Type
facilityType.description: The category of the facility, such as health, benefits, cemetery, or vet center.

mobile.title: Mobile Facility
mobile.description: Indicates if the facility is mobile (true) or stationary (false).

name.title: Facility Name
name.description: The official name of the facility.

operationalHoursSpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions regarding the operating hours, including exceptions.
operationalHoursSpecialInstructions.x-example: More hours are available for some services. If you need to talk to someone, call the Vet Center at 1-877-927-8387. Vet Center hours are dependent upon outreach assignments.

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: The time zone in which the facility is located.

visn.title: Veterans Integrated Service Network (VISN)
visn.description: The VISN to which the facility belongs.

website.title: Website
website.description: The official website of the facility.

FacilityReadResponse.title: Facility Read Response
FacilityReadResponse.description: Contains detailed data for a single facility.

GenericError.title: Generic Error
GenericError.description: Defines a general error response structure for various types of errors, such as authorization issues or invalid requests.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: A detailed error message explaining the reason for the error.

Hours.title: Operating Hours
Hours.description: Details the standard operating hours for each day of the week. Note that hours may vary due to holidays or events.

Meta.title: Response Metadata
Meta.description: Contains metadata about the response, including the version of data sets used.

bandVersion.title: Band Version
bandVersion.description: Indicates the version of the drive time band data set.

Nearby.title: Nearby Facility
Nearby.description: Describes a VA facility located near a specified location, including facility attributes and identifier.

NearbyAttributes.title: Nearby Facility Time Attributes

maxTime.title: Maximum Time
maxTime.description: The maximum time, in minutes, to reach the facility.

minTime.title: Minimum Time
minTime.description: The minimum time, in minutes, to reach the facility.

NearbyResponse.description: Response object containing minimum and maximum times to reach nearby VA facilities.

data.description: An array of nearby VA facilities.

OperatingStatus.title: Operating Status
OperatingStatus.description: Describes the current operational status of the facility, indicating normal operations, limited services, closures, or special notices.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Provides further details on the facility's operational status, such as specific visitor notices.

code.title: Status Code
code.description: A code representing the facility's overall operational status.

supplementalStatus.title: Supplemental Status
supplementalStatus.description: A list of additional statuses providing more detail about the facility's operations.

PageLinks.title: Page Links
PageLinks.description: Provides hyperlinks to the first, last, next, and previous pages of the paginated response, including a link to related information and the current page.

last.description: URL to the last page of the response.

next.title: Next Page Link
next.description: URL to the next page of the response.

prev.title: Previous Page Link
prev.description: URL to the previous page of the response.

related.title: Related Link
related.description: URL to related pages or information for the response.

self.title: Current Page Link
self.description: URL to the current page of the response.

Pagination.title: Pagination Data
Pagination.description: Details the pagination structure of the response, including the current page, total pages, entries per page, and total number of entries.

currentPage.title: Current Page
currentPage.description: The number of the current page in the response.

perPage.title: Results Per Page
perPage.description: The number of results displayed per page.

totalEntries.title: Total Entries
totalEntries.description: The total number of entries matching the query.

totalPages.title: Total Pages
totalPages.description: The total number of pages resulting from the query.

Parent.title: Parent Facility
Parent.description: Reference data for a facility's parent organization, including ID and API link.

id.description: The identifier of the parent facility.

primaryCareRoutine.description: Satisfaction score for routine primary care.

PatientWaitTime.title: Patient Wait Time

established.title: Established Patient Wait Time
established.description: Average wait time for established patients seeking non-urgent appointments.

new.description: Average wait time for new patients seeking non-urgent appointments.

Phone.description: A collection of telephone contact numbers for the facility, covering various services and departments.

afterHours.description: Contact number available outside of normal operating hours.

mentalHealthClinic.description: Contact number for the mental health clinic services.

patientAdvocate.title: Patient Advocate
patientAdvocate.description: Direct line to the facility's patient advocate.

Satisfaction.title: Patient Satisfaction Scores
Satisfaction.description: Contains the patient satisfaction scores for services at the facility, including specific health care service areas.

effectiveDate.title: Effective Date
effectiveDate.description: The date when the satisfaction scores were last updated.

ServiceHealthService.description: Details a specific health service offered at the facility, including the service name, a unique identifier, and a link to more information.

link.description: A fully qualified link to more information about the health service.

name.description: The name of the health service provided by the facility.

serviceId.title: Service ID
serviceId.description: A unique identifier for the health service, which can be used to reference the service programmatically.

ServiceInfo.title: General Service Information
ServiceInfo.description: Basic information about a service provided by the facility, including service type and identifier.

serviceType.title: Service Type
serviceType.description: Category of the service provided (e.g., health, benefits).

ServiceOtherService.title: Other Services Information
ServiceOtherService.description: Provides information about other types of services offered by the facility that do not fall under the standard health or benefits categories.

name.title: Service Name
name.description: The name of the service provided.

serviceId.title: Service ID
serviceId.description: A unique identifier for the service.

Services.title: VA Facility Services
Services.description: A comprehensive list of all services provided by the VA facility, categorized by type such as benefits, health, and other services.

benefits.title: Benefits Services
benefits.description: A collection of services related to benefits offered by the facility.

health.title: Health Services
health.description: A collection of health-related services provided by the facility.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.description: The date when the services information was most recently updated.

link.title: Services Link
link.description: A base URL for accessing detailed information about services at the facility.

SupplementalStatus.title: Supplemental Status
SupplementalStatus.description: Additional status information for the VA facility, providing more specific details beyond the basic operational status.

id.title: Status ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the supplemental status.

label.title: Status Label
label.description: A descriptive label for the supplemental status, explaining its meaning in human-readable terms.
label.x-example: COVID-19 health protection guidelines: Levels low
